author: nancymarinelli
body:
fline vertices

#### PR description:

Simple change of the x-axis scale of all plots as a function of the number of offline vertices. To accomodate 2021 PU level. Would possibly be usefull to back port to 10_X_Y if that is meant to be used for 2021 tests 

#### PR validation:

I tried in the 11_0_X most recent IB the runTheMatrix --what standard -l 1332.0
title: Validation/RecoEgamma and DQMOffline/EGamma: Increase the x-axis scale for all plots as a function of number of offline vertices
